fields.name: GIM:
fields.value: You will be given a list of simulated players equal in quantity to that of the current game of GIMT. Each of them will get a randomly/arbitrarily generated role. You can submit an action for each player in the simulation during night, or the phase specified by the ability. Their evening score will all be set as equal to yours from last evening. Your simulation will be processed alongside the actual game, and you’ll be given all sim players’ non-TWOW feedback.

fields.name: Link Cable (75%, x1):
fields.value: target any player, dead or alive. If they are alive, the player will receive the visits and perform the abilities of the sim player corresponding with their position on the player list, in addition to their own. if the real player is dead, the corresponding simulated player will die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Play your game until it ends. Nobody can win with you until you’re done with your game :)
